participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

hormone_sal_sex.Description: Hormone saliva sample tube cap color: | 1=Pink/Purple (female) ; 2=Blue (male) ; 3=Participant unable to complete ; 4=Participant/Parent refused ; 6=Institution not authorized to collect samples due to COVID ; 7=Staff discomfort due to COVID ; 8=Exceed 15min of < 6ft distance from youth (COVID) ; 9=Not approved by ABCD for collection ; 5=Not collected (other)

Levels.6: Institution not authorized to collect samples due to COVID
Levels.9: Not approved by ABCD for collection

hormone_sal_wake_y.Description: What time did you wake up today?

hormone_sal_caff_y.Description: Have you had any caffeine in the last 12 hours? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

hormone_sal_caff_mg_y.Description:
How many drinks (mg) did you have?

 RA: Please use the following link to determine total miligrams per serving size and open the link in new window: caffeine chart | record drinks as total miligrams (use 'caffeine chart' link)

hormone_sal_active.Description: In the last 12 hours, did you exercise vigorously (sweating, breathing hard) for at least 20 minutes? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

hormone_sal_active_minutes_y.Description: For how long did you exercise? | record time as minutes, minimum is approx 20 minutes

hormone_sal_start_y.Description: Hormone saliva sample time collection started?

hormone_sal_end_y.Description: Hormone saliva sample time collection finished?

hormone_sal_bc_y.Description: Hormone saliva barcode: | Use the Barcode Scanner - do NOT type barcode label

hormons_sal_freeztemp_y.Description: Hormone sample storage temperature: | 1 = -20 C freezer; 2 = -80 C freezer | Indicate temperature of 3-month storage freezer here.

Levels.2: -80 C freezer | Indicate temperature of 3-month storage freezer here.

hormon_sal_notes_y___1.Description: Note any concerns about sample (all that apply) (1, None) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

hormon_sal_notes_y___2.Description: Note any concerns about sample (all that apply) ( 2, Contaminated) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

hormon_sal_notes_y___3.Description: Note any concerns about sample (all that apply) ( 3, Discoloration) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

hormon_sal_notes_y___4.Description: Note any concerns about sample (all that apply) ( 4, Excessive bubbles) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

hormon_sal_notes_y___5.Description: Note any concerns about sample (all that apply) ( 5, Very little saliva provided) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes

hormon_sal_notes_y___6.Description: Note any concerns about sample (all that apply) ( 6, Other) | 0 = No; 1 = Yes
